articles.title: Strong Solar Flare Could Trigger Auroras on Earth – In Time for Diwali in India - The Wire Science
articles.description: A strong solar flare erupted earlier this week that could affect GPS and communication satellites in the coming days, and also cause auroras in Europe and North America.

articles.title: Anglo American appoints Duncan Wanblad as new CEO and, mirabile, he is South African - Daily Maverick
articles.description: Anglo American has appointed insider Duncan Wanblad as its new CEO. He becomes the first South African to run the company that’s been ingrained in South Africa’s history for 15 years.
